nav_publishDescription: It is the feature that allows you to share your dictionary publicly. It is only valid for the dictionary you have activated.
nav_HeroBadge: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
nav_HeroSectionDescription: Wordigo is a customizable dictionary application where you can add and share words.
nav_HeroBannerDescription: Expand your vocabulary with the Wordigo extension - Download now and enhance your word learning experience!
about_description: Wordigo allows you to translate and add discovered words while browsing with its browser extension, and share them in your personal dictionary. The Wordigo team collaborates to provide a more effective language learning experience.
